certifications.title: AWS Certified Developer - Associate
certifications.description: Demonstrates proficiency in developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications using AWS services.

certifications.title: Professional Scrum Master I (PSM I)
certifications.description: Validates knowledge of Scrum framework and ability to apply it effectively in a team environment.

certifications.title: Meta Front-End Developer Certificate
certifications.description: Comprehensive program covering modern front-end development practices and React ecosystem.

certifications.title: MongoDB Certified Developer Associate
certifications.description: Validates skills in developing applications with MongoDB database and ecosystem tools.

certifications.title: Google Cloud Associate Cloud Engineer
certifications.description: Demonstrates ability to deploy applications, monitor operations, and maintain cloud projects on Google Cloud.

certifications.title: Docker Certified Associate
certifications.description: Validates Docker skills including containerization, orchestration, and security best practices.

certifications.title: FreeCodeCamp Full Stack Web Development
certifications.description: Comprehensive full-stack web development certification covering frontend and backend technologies.

certifications.title: Certified Kubernetes Application Developer (CKAD)
certifications.description: Validates skills in designing and building applications for Kubernetes environments.

certifications.title: CompTIA Security+
certifications.description: Foundational cybersecurity certification covering security concepts and best practices.

certifications.title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900)
certifications.description: Foundational knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.
